channel.title: Anyone know how to make your own source... What do i start with?
channel.description: And how do i make custom items, and how to add objects. [shadow=red,left]And lastly.. i need a software that runs/opens .cfg, .class and .java files[/shadow] Thx... well lets just say i need the whole kitten kaboodle :D Sigh... One last thing... how do i make npcs respawn (To put them in my source do i just do ::npc 0001 ?) Im trying not to be like nooby, i know how to change everything in like the folders but i need to know theese things :o :cool: :cool: :cool: :cool:
